TMP4="rpi4"

DEF="../defconfig"
PAT="../patches"
CC="../patches/cc"
NC="../patches/nc"
UP="../patches/userpatches"

CORES=`nproc`
KERNEL="linux-rpi"
# do not edit above this line

# stage1
IMGSIZE="3975MB"

PKGS1="tzdata keyboard-configuration sudo man-db dbus initramfs-tools \
	e2fsprogs fonty-rg patch curl wget apt-transport-https dirmngr \
	cmake rsync psmisc git"

PKGS2="cpu hwinfo haveged resolvconf build-essential net-tools ifplugd \
	fuse wpasupplicant wireless-tools usbutils alsa-utils gettext \
	bison flex mc nano figlet toilet dialog python3 python3-setuptools \
	openssh-client openssh-server ntfs-3g bc zram-tools libncursesw5-dev \
	libssl-dev autopoint autoconf automake pkg-config libtool fake-hwclock \
	avahi-utils plymouth-themes lightdm-gtk-greeter lightdm pv"

XFCE4="xfce4 xinit thunar chromium mousepad gvfs-backends gvfs-fuse \
	xfce4-terminal avahi-utils pulseaudio blueman xfce4-goodies file-roller \
	network-manager network-manager-gnome gnome-screensaver feh fbi"

FIRMWARE="firmware-linux"

# https://archive.raspberrypi.org/debian/pool/main/r/rpi-eeprom/
EEPROM_VERSION="8.0"

# motd
BRAND="Raspberry Pi"
